title: Roy Johnson (boxer)
text: Roy Johnson (born 2 July 1948) is a Bermudian <a href="boxing">boxer</a>. He competed in the <a href="Boxing%20at%20the%201972%20Summer%20Olympics%20%E2%80%93%20Light%20welterweight">men's light welterweight</a> event at the <a href="1972%20Summer%20Olympics">1972 Summer Olympics</a>.
